 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָנָה‎</span><sub>84</sub> **verb** ==get, acquire== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Phoenician (Punic) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מקנא‎</span>, ***property*** [in cattle]; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡anû***</u></abbr>, ***gain***, ***acquire***, [[BDB#Meissn|Meissn]]<sup>Suppl. 85</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">,<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">) ***acquire, procure***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קני‎</span> ***acquire, possess***, [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv,no.89,5.6</sup>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קני‎</span> noun ***property*** Id<sup>ib,no.3,8,29,3</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***acquire, subjugate***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְנָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (***accquire***); — 

**Qal**<sub>81</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Gen.25.10|Gen 25:10]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֶָ נ֑ךָ‎</span> [[Deut.32.6|Deut 32:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָנָהוּ‎</span> [[Lev.27.24|Lev 27:24]] 3 feminine singular<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָֽנְתָה‎</span> [[Ps.78.54|Ps 78:54]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָנִיתָ‎</span> [[Exod.15.16|Exod 15:16]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקְנֶךְ‎</span> [[Lev.22.11|Lev 22:11]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִ֫קֶן‎</span> [[Gen.33.19|Gen 33:19]] +, etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְנֵח‎</span> [[Gen.47.19|Gen 47:19]] +; ***Infinitive*** absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָנֹה‎</span> [[Lev.25.14|Lev 25:14]]; [[1Chr.21.24|1Chr 21:24]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָנוֺ‎</span> [[2Sam.24.24|2Sam 24:24]] ***cstr***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְנֹה‎</span> [[Prov.16.16|Prov 16:16]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְנוֺת‎</span> [[Prov.16.16|Prov 16:16]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹנֶה‎</span> [[Deut.28.68|Deut 28:68]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְוֺנֶה‎</span> [[Prov.15.32|Prov 15:32]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***get, acquire*** (all poetry) : 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of God as originating, creating, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹנֵה שָׁמַיִם וָאָרֶץ‎</span> [[Gen.14.19|Gen 14:19]]; [[Gen.14.22|Gen 14:22]]; [[Deut.32.6|Deut 32:6]] (Israel), [[Ps.139.13|Ps 139:13]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּלְֹיתָ֑י‎</span>); [[Prov.8.22|Prov 8:22]] ( <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חכמה‎</span> q. v.). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of God as victoriously redeeming his people [[Exod.15.16|Exod 15:16]]; [[Isa.11.11|Isa 11:11]]; [[Ps.74.2|Ps 74:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּאַל‎</span>) object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַרוֶֿה‎</span> [[Ps.78.54|Ps 78:54]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of Eve, acquiring <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַיִן‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתיֿ‎</span> (i.e. ***with the help of***), [[Gen.4.1|Gen 4:1]] ([[BDB#J|J]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** of acquiring wisdom, knowledge (only Proverbs): [[Prov.1.5|Prov 1:5]]; [[Prov.4.5|Prov 4:5]] (twice in verse); [[Prov.4.7|Prov 4:7]] (twice in verse); [[Prov.15.32|Prov 15:32]]; [[Prov.16.16|Prov 16:16]] (twice in verse); [[Prov.17.16|Prov 17:16]]; [[Prov.18.15|Prov 18:15]]; [[Prov.19.8|Prov 19:8]]; [[Prov.23.23|Prov 23:23]]. 

**2.** elsewhere ***buy*** [[Exod.21.2|Exod 21:2]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Gen.47.22|Gen 47:22]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.50.13|Gen 50:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), [[Lev.27.24|Lev 27:24]]([[BDB#H|H]]), [[Deut.28.68|Deut 28:68]]; [[Isa.24.2|Isa 24:2]]; [[Jer.13.1|Jer 13:1]]; [[Ezek.7.12|Ezek 7:12]]; [[Prov.20.14|Prov 20:14]] +; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹנֶה‎</span> ***owner***, as purchaser [[Lev.25.30|Lev 25:30]] ([[BDB#P|P]]) [[Isa.1.3|Isa 1:3]]; [[Zech.11.5|Zech 11:5]] +. **Niph\`al** ***be bought***: ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְנָה‎</span> [[Jer.32.43|Jer 32:43]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקָּנוּ‎</span> v[[Jer.32.15|Jer 32:15]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָדָם חִקְנַנִי‎</span> [[Zech.13.5|Zech 13:5]] [[BDB#AV|AV]] makes denominative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקְנֶה‎</span> ***cattle***; [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]<sup>Kau</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] ***caused*** (one) ***to purchase me***, i.e. ***made me a bondman***; &lt; [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲרָמָה קִנְיָנִי‎</span> — ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַקְנֶה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קנא‎</span>.
